treatmentsSection.title: Treatment Methods
treatmentsSection.description: Our physical therapy treatment methods include a range of solutions to meet your individual needs.

therapy.title: Therapy
therapy.description: Multi-method therapy to improve all musculoskeletal pain, injury, and bone conditions

consultation.title: Deep Consultation
consultation.description: Expert functional health assessment and personalized treatment plans for each customer

muscleRelaxation.title: Muscle Relaxation
muscleRelaxation.description: Reduce muscle tension, improve movement health

basicTraining.title: Basic Training
basicTraining.description: 1-on-1 coaching with rehab exercises to improve posture and post-injury recovery

servicesPage.title: Specialized Treatment Methods
servicesPage.description: Choose the problem you're facing to find the most suitable treatment method

problemSelection.emptyState: No problem categories found. Please add categories in Sanity Studio.

emptyState.noTreatmentsDesc: Services do not have specific treatment protocols yet. Please contact us for consultation.
emptyState.noMatchesDesc: Please select a different problem or contact us for more consultation

booking.title: Book Consultation
booking.notePlaceholder: Example: I would like to book in the morning...

validation.nameFormat: Full name can only contain letters

toast.successMessage: Your booking request has been sent. We will contact you soon!

cupping.title: Cupping
cupping.description: Method using vacuum suction to relieve pain and relax muscles.

tapping.title: Tapping
tapping.description: Light tapping method to stimulate muscles and nerves, reduce stress and improve circulation.

heatLight.title: Infrared Light
heatLight.description: Therapy using infrared light to warm muscles, improve blood circulation and relieve pain.

iastm.title: IASTM (Soft Tissue Mobilization Tool)
iastm.description: Technique using specialized tools to stimulate and improve soft tissue, reduce pain and enhance recovery.

coldPlunge.title: Cold Plunge
coldPlunge.description: Cold water therapy to reduce pain and improve circulation.

dryNeedling.title: Dry Needling
dryNeedling.description: Technique using small needles to stimulate muscle trigger points and relieve chronic pain.

dds.title: Bioelectric Therapy (DDS)
dds.description: Therapy using light electrical current to stimulate muscles and nerves, relieve pain and promote recovery.
